credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
rim: 4 3/16 in. (10.6 cm)
Overall: 1 3/4 in. (4.5 cm)
Base: 1 3/4 in. (4.5 cm)
title: wide-rimmed bowl
description: Very thin, natural, bluish-green glass. steep-sided bowl with outcurved, tooled rim. Small tubular (ring) foot. Slightly concave case. Pitted weathering marks interior and exterior. Iridescence; some milky-white patches.
